thread.section_title: New product topics in Answer HQ
thread.title: Downloading lovestruck corrupted legacy game

author: awakenthisworld
title: Downloading lovestruck corrupted legacy game
text:
Product : The Sims 4
Platform : Microsoft XBOX One
Which language are you playing the game in? English
How often does the bug occur? Occasionally (10% - 49%)
What is your current game version number? Xbox latest
What expansions, game packs, and stuff packs do you have installed? For Rent, Growing Together, High School Years, Cottage Living, Snowy Escape, Eco Lifestyle, Discover University, Island Living, Seasons, Cats and Dogs, City Living, Get Together, Get To Work, My Wedding Stories, Dream Home Decorator, Realm of Magic, Jungle Adventure, Parenthood, Vampires, Dine Out, Spa Day, Outdoor Retreat, Nifty Knitting, Tiny Living, My First Pet, Laundry Day, Toddler,Kids Room, Cool Kitchen
Steps: How can we find the bug ourselves? I installed lovestruck. Started the game. Then got the Game Data incomplete error
What happens when the bug occurs? When I go into incomplete save. Laundry Day appears to be gone and all items from there are gone. I turned off game. Uninstalled and reinstalled laundry day. Then hard reset and cleared Xbox cache. Save loaded fine with everything there. The next day I played again and got the same save data incomplete except now I can't load into the game at all. Also Copperdale is missing from worlds menu
What do you expect to see? Continue playing my legacy game I have been playing for years with all the packs I have purchased.
Have you installed any customization with the game, e.g. Custom Content or Mods? On console - never used.
Did this issue appear after a specific patch or change you made to your system? Yes
Please describe the patch or change you made. Got lovestruck, cleared Xbox save file, tried to load back in
â€Œ
Please help
